text: 11|27|to un pramukhon ne, jo unakee jaati mein se kaafir ho gaye, kahaah hamato tujhe apane hee jaisa maanav purush dekh rahe hain aur ham dekh rahe hain ki tumhaara anusaran kevan vahee log kar rahe hain, jo hamamen neech hain. vo bhee bina soche-samajhe aur ham apane oopar tumhaaree koee pradhaanata bhee nahin dekhate, balki ham tumhen jhootha samajhate hain.
